typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		activityid as string,
		directioncode as boolean,
		statuscode as integer,
		subject as string,
		scheduledend as timestamp,
		regardingobjectid as string,
		actualdurationminutes as integer,
		ownerid as string,
		prioritycode as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DataverseParquet
source(output(
		activitytype as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_activityid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		regardingid as string,
		duration as integer,
		direction as boolean,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		priority as integer,
		status as integer,
		duedate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG
DataverseParquet derive(RAWHASH = crc32(512,upper(toString(ownerid)),toString(statuscode),toString(scheduledend),toString(prioritycode))) ~> CrearHASH
CrearHASH, STG lookup(upper(activityid) == BK_activityid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(HASHKEY),
	HASHKEY != RAWHASH,
	disjoint: false) ~> Split@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
Split@Nuevos alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Insertar
Split@Actualizaciones alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> Actualizar
Insertar derive(RAWActivityTy = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
Actualizar derive(RAWActivityTy = 1) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		activitytype as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_activityid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		regardingid as string,
		duration as integer,
		direction as boolean,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		priority as integer,
		status as integer,
		duedate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		activitytype = RAWActivityTy,
		HASHKEY = RAWHASH,
		BK_activityid = activityid,
		ownerid = Split@Nuevos@ownerid,
		regardingid = regardingobjectid,
		duration = actualdurationminutes,
		direction = directioncode,
		modifiedon = Split@Nuevos@modifiedon,
		priority = prioritycode,
		status = statuscode,
		duedate = scheduledend
	)) ~> Nuevos
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		activitytype as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_activityid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		regardingid as string,
		duration as integer,
		direction as boolean,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		priority as integer,
		status as integer,
		duedate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['BK_activityid'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		activitytype = RAWActivityTy,
		HASHKEY = RAWHASH,
		BK_activityid,
		ownerid = Split@Actualizaciones@ownerid,
		regardingid = regardingobjectid,
		duration = actualdurationminutes,
		direction = directioncode,
		modifiedon = Split@Actualizaciones@modifiedon,
		priority = prioritycode,
		status = statuscode,
		duedate = scheduledend
	)) ~> Actualizaciones
